findings.details: Main landmark lacked programmatic association with the primary page heading on several layouts/pages (including the 404 page), reducing screen reader navigation clarity.
Network checks were skipped in this run; no link validation executed.
Add aria-labelledby to main and ensure a single primary heading is referenced per layout for stronger accessibility semantics.
Recent posts and policy pages updated in February 2026.

recommendations: Associate main landmarks with a single primary heading using aria-labelledby across layouts
Run link validation with network access to confirm external URLs
